attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is an invasion of our right to privacy to have people from the council entering our homes, taking photos and notes as to whether we have worked hard to have a pleasant environment in which to live, just so they can whack up the already very unfair and crippling council tax. This is taking BIG BROTHER way too far. Only invited people should be allowed into our homes and we must not be forced into complying with a policy we deem as totally unfair.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
